8
4/8+1/2=x+6/12+3/6
1/2+20/32+100/160+4/8+9/18+3/6+x+20/40=8/8+2/8+5/8+7/8+10/40
3/9-6/18=x-4/12-2/6
1/4-20/32-100/160-4/16-9/36-3/12-x-20/80=81/81-8/2-6/3-7/8-10/40-8/32-100/400
(8+5)*(4+9)*x=(6+7)*(11+2)
(14+7)*(29-8)*x*(20+1)*(36-15)*(8+5)*(4+9)=(36-4)*(12+20)*(14+18)*(29+3)*(64-32)*(44-12)
(8+6+5)*(29-6)*x*(22-2+1)*(34-15)*(8+7)*(16-5+4)=(26-4)*(2+20)*(14+8)*(19+3+7-10)*(54-32)*(34-12)
4000/100-330/11+8*5+((180/9*14/7)+(80*4)-40)/(6+2)-390/13=8-(500-420)/2+x+(150-105)/30*20-7*(34+6)/(3+4)
